name: Maze Back Home
description:
In the core of a pitch black maze that echoes a distant past lies our lost reject with just the company of our lovely glowing little “friend”. But Lanterns are ravenous creatures. They prey on human sorrow and gooey oil to keep themselves lit. Don’t step too deep into the darkness and find your way out. But somebody is keeping track of every glare.

Team:

  • Marcos Butrón Rúa - programming
  • Eva Blanco Jimenez - art
  • Adrián Manchado Carreira - art and storytelling
  • Diego Fernández García - programming
  • Carmelo Vázquez Navarro - design + Sound
